lines.name: 1 Line
lines.description: The 1 Line (formerly Central Link) is the primary light rail line serving Seattle, running from Lynnwood in the north through downtown Seattle and the University District to Angle Lake near Sea-Tac Airport.

lines.name: 2 Line
lines.description: The 2 Line (formerly East Link) connects Seattle to Bellevue and Redmond, crossing Lake Washington on the I-90 floating bridge. It serves the Eastside tech corridor.

lines.name: T Line (Tacoma Link)
lines.description: The T Line (Tacoma Link) provides free streetcar service through downtown Tacoma, connecting the Theater District to the Stadium District and Hilltop neighborhood.
